references.name: Godly.website
references.notes: Curated gallery of premium web designs. Great for landing page inspiration.

references.name: Dribbble
references.notes: Design community with high-quality UI shots. Filter by 'Product Design' and 'Web Design'.

references.name: Awwwards
references.notes: Award-winning websites. Focus on Sites of the Day for top-tier execution.

references.name: 21st.dev
references.notes: Community component library. Excellent for grabbing production-ready UI patterns.

references.name: shadcn/ui
references.notes: Accessible component library built on Radix UI. Gold standard for component patterns.

references.name: Streamlit Gallery
references.notes: Official Streamlit showcase. Useful for understanding framework capabilities and limitations.

references.name: OpenHands.dev
references.notes: Agent IDE with canvas interaction. Great reference for ABIS node editor UX.

references.name: Linear
references.notes: Best-in-class keyboard-first UI. Reference for command palette, shortcuts, speed.
